name: visualbotcrafter
description: An awesome software to create and manage your own bots.

scripts.dev:actual:
npm run clean && npm run dev-setup && concurrently --prefix-colors "yellow,cyan,blue,magenta,green" -n webpack,sass,tsc,preload,electron "npm run sass:watch" "tsc -w" "npm run dev:preload" "cross-env NODE_ENV=development webpack serve --config webpack.config.mjs --mode development" "wait-on http://localhost:4000/src/index.html && echo '
üèçÔ∏è Running electron app
' && npm run dev:electron" | node cross_platform/log-filter.js
scripts.dev:quick: concurrently -n electron "cross-env NODE_ENV=development ELECTRON_ARGS='--no-sandbox' node restart.js"
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.copy-assets: npm run sass && shx mkdir -p dist/src && shx cp -r app/src/assets dist/src/ && shx cp -r app/src/js dist/src/ && shx cp app/preload-esm.mjs dist/ && npm run copy-html
scripts.dev-setup: npm run sass && shx mkdir -p dist/src && shx cp -r app/src/assets dist/src/ && shx cp -r app/src/js dist/src/ && shx cp app/preload-esm.mjs dist/ && npm run copy-html
scripts.watch:js-files: nodemon --watch app/src/js --ext js,ts --ignore *.d.ts --exec "shx cp -r app/src/js dist/src/"
scripts.copy-html: shx mkdir -p dist/src && shx cp app/src/index.html dist/src/index.html && shx cp app/src/builder.html dist/src/builder.html && node cross_platform/fix-paths.js && node cross_platform/sleep.js 1000
scripts.sass: npm run sass:builder && npm run sass:index
scripts.restart:debug: cross-env RESTART_DELAY=0 NODEMON_RESTART=true NODE_ENV=development node restart.js
